header.title5: What if your project is next?
header.imgAlt: Classic David-style bust in blue with 3D mesh texture, using a virtual reality headset on a blue background.
header.title3: We design and <blue>develop</blue> for <pink>people</pink> like you
header.paragraph: We create digital solutions that don't just stay on paper. Here you can see some ideas that have already been brought to life with strategy, creativity, and vision. The next project could be yours.

projectsList.title: by Carla Herrero
projectsList.description: Website for a brand specializing in branding, social media, and web design. It showcases her services and projects with a visual, dynamic, and easy-to-update design.
projectsList.imgAlt: Mobile screenshot of the website 'by Carla Herrero'

projectsList.title: RDA Padel Academy
projectsList.description: Digital project that gives visibility to the brand's philosophy, teams, and events with a solid and modern image, including sections editable by the client.
projectsList.imgAlt: Tablet screenshot of the website 'RDA Padel Academy'

projectsList.title: El Whoper
projectsList.description: El Whoper is a website with a unique and 100% original style. Designed for an illustrator and designer, it reflects his creative and professional essence. Its goal: to showcase his services visually and attract new clients.
projectsList.imgAlt: Desktop screenshot of the website 'El Whoper'

projectsList.title: Student's MG
projectsList.description: An app that allows our client to easily organize and control student payments by quarters. It securely stores information and generates ready-to-print invoices every three months. A practical and simple tool to always keep records in order.
projectsList.imgAlt: Desktop screenshot of the app 'Student's MG'

testimonialsList.subTitle: Education
testimonialsList.title: Pablo García Calvo
testimonialsList.paragraph: As a teacher, I couldn't be happier with this application! It makes keeping track of student records and payments very easy.

testimonialsList.subTitle: Digital Marketing
testimonialsList.title: Carla Herrero
testimonialsList.paragraph: Mario! Highly recommended; I have collaborated with him and we achieved the best results. He is the best in the field.

testimonialsList.subTitle: Artistic
testimonialsList.title: Félix González
testimonialsList.paragraph: 'netneo' will put so much enthusiasm into having your own website into developing it. Maximum work and dedication will ensure the result is what you desire, the one that best suits your business. They will advise you so your project gains the visibility it deserves. A sure success if you trust 'netneo'
